messages.message:
Hi Team,
I am currently working on this build project (https://aihub.instabase.com/build/0196662f-8ab3-731d-8a74-9db0e690cad0) to merge all the ROI fields and tables using a custom function. However, I am encountering an issue where the selected fields (arguments) are getting unselected automatically during the selection process. I am attaching video for your reference.I'm unsure whether this is a known issue.Please help me here.
cc:@Rajendra, @Pritam Roy, @Nithin
